label.value: ${eval(#{eval( # ${get([identifier])} ${CL([sourceSystemId])} ${CL([type])} ${if(${get([subType])}<>null).then( ${CL([subType])} )} ${get([artistNames])} ${get([title])} ${if(${get([creationDates])}<>null).then( ${get([creationDates])} )} ${if(${get([medium])}<>null).then( ${get([medium])} )} ${if(${get([physicalDimensions])}<>null).then( ${get([physicalDimensions])} )} ${get([emf:version])} ${user(${get([modifiedBy])})} ${date([modifiedOn]).format(YYYY-MM-dd, HH:mm)} )})}
